alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 8:22AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cheyenne and southeastern Kimball Counties through 800 AM MDT... At 721 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Kimball Airport, or 9 miles southeast of Kimball, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potter, Dix, Brownson and Kimball Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
